Event Body: Experience an open day at Robert Gordon University, where they throw open their doors and welcome everyone to experience a day in the life on their campus/grounds. Generally, you can experience first hand whether this is the right fit for you. Take the time to plan your day and agenda. Open days can have a huge impact on your final decision and should not be missed. Please dont forget to come back and 'rate and review' your excperience right here on Odays!
